content.content: We have our first OP Governance Call scheduled!  The time is August 2nd at 10am PT/1pm ET, 7pm CET and will be biweekly.  The meeting details and agenda are below.  The call is open to anyone in the OP Community to join.  I will facilitate until someone else can take over.  Please reach out to me if you would like to be added to the agenda.  Looking forward to seeing everyone! Agenda Previous Voting Cycle #3 Results Current Voting Cycle #4 Upcoming Governance Cycle Open Discussion - proposal feedback, governance issues and feedback, etc  docs.google.com    2022/8/2 Optimism Bi Weekly Governance Call Optimism Bi Weekly Governance Call August 2, 2022      Meeting Info Join Zoom Meeting   Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Meeting ID: 964 3417 4431 Passcode: 368400
Hey @katie Could you share the link to add this meeting to the calendar? I don’t wanna forget it

Here you go! Please download and import the following iCalendar (.ics) files to your calendar system. Weekly: https://zoom.us/meeting/tJIpdO2pqT8uGdVO-kmr8EsbBoSCx0YU-aqf/ics?icsToken=98tyKuCuqjguG9ORtBqGRowABojCLOvwtilbjadrs1LuDjILRxD0FO1xEaovKe2d

katie:  The time is August 2nd at 10am PT/1pm ET, 5pm CET   Hi Katie, thanks for being proactive and setting this up. Just to clarify though, 10am PST is 7 pm CET I think, rather than ‘5’. I hope so anyway so that it can be after I finish work!

Hey katie. Thanks for organizing this! So this is going to be biweekly starting next Tuesday? I hope to be able to attend, though after 18:30 (I am in CET) it’s family time for me so may be hard to get in calls at 19:00. But will see!

Wonderful!  Yes, the calls will start next Tuesday then take place on Tuesdays every other week.  I totally understand family commitments, I will make sure the call is recorded.  Hope to see you there!

Thanks for organizing this Katie! I have a weekly full team sync at 1pm ET on Tuesdays so I won’t be able to attend, but hoping the call goes well. If we can ensure it’s recorded and made available afterwards that’d be amazing
Definitely! I will share the recording after the call
Glad to be here  Great initiative @katie

Thank you all for joining the very first OP Governance call! A short summary of issues discussed is below.  The recording will be posted shortly. Delegate office hours Voting committees based on areas of interest and expertise (being worked on) More detailed proposal template for projects (being worked on) Gap between voting rounds Moderation in Discord and Forum Foundation’s role in governance Delegate compensation Delegate approval process Use of funds differing from purpose in proposal How project funds are granted based on milestones Locking proposal editing after going to Snapshot Cap on proposal amounts

That was really awesome I thought - another point I just thought of - how helpful was an hour chat on video compared to 2 months of text discussion? From my perspective quite a bit of clarity was gained in that single hour… just wanted to share that. Very glad you coordinated this!
Hey Katie, any idea when the call recording will be made available? Cheers.
Thanks for putting it together @katie Great conversations. Looking forward to the next one!
Here you go!   drive.google.com    video1911010495.mp4 Google Drive file.
